short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Picks a random item from a list.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This friendly extension makes decisions easy. The extension lets to write and recall lists from Chrome's local storage. You are able to select one of these lists and have the extension choose a randomized item off of the chosen list. The extension supports eight lists currently.
